content: RPereira – DInf/UFPR - Prof. Roberto Pereira Skip to content Recent PostsArchives Professor and researcher at the Department of Informatics, Federal University of Paraná (UFPR), Curitiba, Brazil.  From 2015 to 2023, I have served as Associate Editor for the Brazilian Journal on Computers in Education, Editor-in-Chief of the Horizontes Magazine, and as a member of the special Human Computer Interaction (IHC) committee in Brazil (2016-2021). Currently, I am serving as: Editor-in-Chief of the Journal on Interactive Systems (JIS)(2020-), Associate Editor of the ACM Journal on Responsible Computing (2022-), and Coordinator of the UFPR’s Graduate Program in Computer Science. Research areas: Human-Computer Interaction, Computing Education, Social Software, Computational Thinking, Human Values and Culture in Interactive Systems Design, Sociotechnical Systems.
